sentences: Marjo Anneli Arho (born 12 April 1951) is a Finnish music educator, writer and composer.
Anneli Arho was born in Helsinki and studied theory and composition at the Sibelius Academy with Jukka Tiensuu.
Minos (1978) for harpsichord, dedicated to Jukka Tiensuu
Answer for mezzo-soprano, horn and string quartet (1978)
